channel.title: Neopets
channel.description:
I hate it. 'Talk about Neopets' is pretty much a useless forum to me. I just made this topic because 'fake rich[b]n[/b]ess' was irritating when I looked at it. Who actually likes Neopets? It seems like just something to add posts to this forum's post count. I think the best course of action would be to make this category, a sub-category of General Gaming. Or to just merge this with General Gaming.
Edit: Actually, I don't know much about Neopets, what is it about? Do you download a client to play? What is the object of the game? To get rich?
